mapper.select: select id, title, view_count from article where status = 0 and view_count != 0 order by view_count desc limit 0,10;

select a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.category_id, a.thumbnail, a.content, a.view_count,a.create_time, c.name as categoryName from article a, category c where a.id = #{id} and a.status = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 and a.category_id = c.id;
